Title: Kamigami no Ki
Description: ['Set during 3000 BCE in the Nile region of Egypt, ', Kamigami no Ki, ' ("Chronicles of the Gods") will depict the comical misadventures of Bastet, Anubis, Ra, and the mysterious ghost Medjedo as well as their caretakers, Iabi and Ahkeu.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: Crunchyroll)']
Related: ['Side story: Kamigami no Ki: Xmas Special']
